title: Regressor, Possessor, Reincarnator - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Psychological   Supernatural
tags: Age Regression   Demon Lord   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Possession   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Secret Organizations   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Time Travel   Transmigration

description:
Allen opened the book.

And there it was.

The fact he wanted to ignore. No, the fact he actually was aware of.

[…Reader Kim Woojin, 21.

Possessed the extra character, ‘Julius Reinhart’, of the novel “The Feast of the Returned Demon King”…]
Julius Reinhart.

My brother’s body was stolen by a possessor.

That day, my brother died.>
